resources.string:
+ Type the number of dice to roll in "Number" column. 
+ Type the modifier (optional) to be added or subtracted in "Modifier" column. 
+ Note: to add or subtract the modifier, use the "+/-" button. 
+ Press each "Roll" button or shake the device to get the result as if you rolled the dice in the real world ;) 
 
+ You can review your latest rolls using the "Log" menu item. 
+ You can roll all the dice using the "Roll dice" menu item. 
 
 Thank you very much for installing the app! :) 
 More info @ www.tarlic.com
Are you sure you want to exit?
